channel.title: Centos on Leif Madsen.
channel.description: Recent content in Centos on Leif Madsen.

item.title: Installing Python 2.7 on CentOS 6.x
item.description: I recently had a need to install Python 2.7 on an older CentOS 6 machine since I wanted to generate some SSL certificates for my web server. On CentOS 6, then default Python installation is 2.6, which doesn’t seem to work for Let’s Encrypt.
